text: at thr we strive every day to provide
happiness as a service to our customers
and we believe that an happy customer is
one that has and feels full control over
its communication we help Brands
centralize manage distribute and measure
digital contents across all channels and
screens we looked at different Cloud
providers and we think that we made the
right choice by selecting Amazon web
services because they provide the whole
Suite of services that we need to keep
the control to the whole infrastructure
I'm Dario deagostini Chief technology
officer at Throne at thron we have more
than 10 years experience in Enterprise
software we have offices in padwa Milan
London and we are growing fast a very
important part of our technology is the
data analysis the user and content
Behavior we analyze to provide very
precise recommendation ations to our
customers and we do that by pushing real
time streams through AWS kesis into an
elastic map reduce Big Data stack that
provide intelligence reporting to our
users through data warehousing as a red
shift we cannot predict how our
customers are going to use our services
so our infrastructure need to scale up
and down accordingly to their needs this
is where the global footprint of AWS
comes to the rescue we will were able to
power Live Events with more than 10
million users in a single day with over
300,000 concurrent users that were
interacting from over 150 countries and
in order to give proof to our customers
that we were able to cope with such a
load we leveraged the flexibility AWS
Cloud provides to create a worldwide
distributed testing environment that was
able to stress test our infrastructure
up to 200,000 connections per second
switching to the cloud allowed the
throne to keep small and focused team on
things that matter like scalability
security
availability and we were able to do that
while we improved our performance in
delivering new features in fact we were
able to shorten our deployment cycle by
half ranging from 6 months to 3 months
and we did that without adding
additional resources
